explains: n. 解放，解放运动；解脱；释出，放出；<非正式>劫掠，偷盗
wordGroup: war of liberation 解放战争
women's liberation 妇女解放运动，女权运动

sentences.en: The list does not include the Irish Republican Army or the Palestine Liberation Organization.
sentences.cn: 这份名单不包括爱尔兰共和军和巴勒斯坦解放组织。

sentences.en: We firmly support the Asian, African and Latin American people in their struggle for liberation!
sentences.cn: 我们坚决支持亚洲、非洲、拉丁美洲各国人民的解放斗争。

sentences.en: As far as manners are concerned, I suppose I have always been a supporter of women's liberation.
sentences.cn: 就礼仪而言，我想我一直是妇女解放运动的支持者。
